OrgName: United Technologies Corporation and all of its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities: United Technologies Corporation and its U.S. business segments, units and divisions, and all other operating units (collectively, "UTC") collect and process personal information from UTC’s employees, contractors, customers, and investors, and from the personnel of UTC’s vendors, suppliers, customers, and investors.  This information is used to manage the employee and contractor relationship, conduct business operations, and operate safely and compliantly with applicable laws.  The information is collected directly from the individual as well as from public and third-party sources.  UTC's practices are described in more detail in its Safe Harbor Privacy Notice, available at http://www.utc.com/Careers/Pages/Privacy-Notices.aspx.
contacttitle1: Assistant General Counsel, Data Privacy and Security
corpofftitle1: VP, Secretary and Associate General Counsel
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

personaldata: Covers all personal information received by UTC in the US, including both electronically or manually processed data
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
